A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I had very mixed feelings. After much thought I decided to give a four and a half rating because in the end of the day motion pictures are made to entertain and I was entertained from beginning to end. I would've done start wars episode 8 differently but they achieved what any movie always aspire so in my works the last jesi will get four and a half stars. I think people are getting too picky and anybody out there now a days is basically born a movie critic it appears.
